How it works

1) Live Permit Radar

We watch LADBS in real time and filter by trade, value, and keywords (roof, re-roof, solar, TPO…). You pick ZIPs.

2) Qualified Outreach

We enrich owner/GC contacts and run Spanish-first multi-channel campaigns (calls, SMS, email). Human + compliant AI.

3) AI That Closes

24/7 phone & chat answer FAQs, capture jobs and book estimates straight to your calendar.

FAQ

What if we don’t get results?

You pick refund or free month—no hoops.

Is outreach compliant?

Yes: consent flows, quiet hours, and one-click opt-outs.

Do you work in Spanish?

Yes, native LA Spanish + English.

How fast can we start?

We can launch in 7 days once we pick ZIPs and trade focus.

Do I keep the data?

Yes—lists and transcripts are yours.
